subject: Re: Thank you for your recent loan request, we are ready to lend money
body:
Your credit history does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this lot will expire THIS NIGHT):
$479,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this one-minute form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://getclvbdyshoes.com/
